events.message: I was involved in a car collision yesterday evening, and I need to file a claim for the damage caused to my vehicle.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to mention of vehicle collision and damage.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to assist you throughout the claim process.
We have received your auto accident claim and will begin assessing the provided information shortly.
Please submit photos of the damaged areas of your car as well as the police report from the accident.
All requested documents including images of vehicle damage and the official accident report have been uploaded.
Our claims investigation team has started reviewing the details and documents submitted for your auto accident.
The investigation into your vehicle accident has been completed, with all evidence and reports reviewed thoroughly.
A settlement offer has been prepared based on the damage assessment and policy coverage for your auto claim.
The customer has responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the process.
Your auto accident claim has been approved and is now ready for payment disbursement.
Payment for the approved claim amount has been issued to your linked bank account today.
The claim case has been officially closed after successful payment and resolution of your auto accident damages.
All documents and correspondence related to your closed auto accident claim have been archived securely.
